channel.title: Power BI on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Power BI on Automaly

item.title: Using Kusto functions in Power BI datasource
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Learn how to create and use Azure Data Explorer (ADX) Kusto functions as Power BI data sources. Simplify data access and enhance reporting with parameterized functions.

item.title: Enable Power BI Embedded in cloud hosted Dynamics 365 finance and operations 8.0 +
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Step-by-step guide for enabling Power BI Embedded integration in cloud-hosted Dynamics 365 Finance Operations 8.0+ environments including workspace configuration.
